radialcolordialog

Class ControlHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • radialcolordialog.ControlHandle

  • public class ControlHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    This a class for the graphic representation of control handles used by the sliders. This keeps the drawing routine for the handles in one place to ensure visual continuity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ControlHandle(java.awt.geom.Point2D point, boolean horizontal)
      Construct the ControlHandle from the base point and horizontal specification.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
      Render the ControlHandle.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlHandle

        public ControlHandle(java.awt.geom.Point2D point,
                     boolean horizontal)
        Construct the ControlHandle from the base point and horizontal specification. Use horizontal mode for radial controls, and vertical (false) for horizontal sliders.
        Parameters:
        point - The base point of the handle.
        horizontal - True if the layout of handle is horizontal, false for vertical layout.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render(java.awt.Graphics2D g2)
        Render the ControlHandle.
        Parameters:
        g2 - The graphics object to render to.
